titleStmt.title: The Case is altered. Or, Dreadful news from hell. In a discourse between the ghost of this grand traytor and tyrant Oliver Croomwel, and sir reverence my Lady Joan his wife, at their late meeting neer the scaffold on Tower-hill. With his epitaph written in hell, on all the grand traytors, now in the Tower.

publicationStmt.publisher: for John Andrews at the white Lyon near Pie-Corner.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
